amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for construction by $3 million and reduces funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount in order to address a backlog of Corps of Engineers projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Construction by $3 million and to reduce funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Gosar.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
